cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's se

sentence.kanji: 彼女は背が高い。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha se ga takai
sentence.english: She's tall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utau

sentence.kanji: 私たちは大きな声で歌いました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha ooki na koe de utaimashita
sentence.english: We sang loudly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumoru

sentence.kanji: 明日は昼頃から曇るでしょう。
sentence.romaji: asu ha hirugoro kara kumoru deshou
sentence.english: It'll probably get cloudy around noon tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawaku

sentence.kanji: 喉が渇きました。
sentence.romaji: nodo ga kawakimashita
sentence.english: I'm thirsty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kita

sentence.kanji: ロシアは日本の北にあります。
sentence.romaji: roshia ha nipon no kita ni arimasu
sentence.english: Russia is north of Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hajime

sentence.kanji: 初めは上手くできませんでした。
sentence.romaji: hajime ha umaku dekimasen deshita 。
sentence.english: I couldn't do it well at first.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maiasa

sentence.kanji: 私は毎朝ジョギングをします。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha maiasa jogingu wo shimasu
sentence.english: I jog every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umi

sentence.kanji: 海は広くて大きい。
sentence.romaji: umi ha hiroku te ookii
sentence.english: The sea is vast and wide.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouhin

sentence.kanji: この商品はよく売れている。
sentence.romaji: kono shouhin ha yoku urete iru
sentence.english: This product is selling well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hajimete

sentence.kanji: 東京に来るのは初めてです。
sentence.romaji: toukyou ni kuru no ha hajimete desu 。
sentence.english: It's the first time I've been to Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seizou

sentence.kanji: この工場ではエアコンを製造しています。
sentence.romaji: kono koujou de ha eakon wo seizou shite imasu
sentence.english: This factory manufactures air conditioning units.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ame

sentence.kanji: 雨が降っています。
sentence.romaji: ame ga fute imasu
sentence.english: It's raining.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jijo

sentence.kanji: うちの次女は春から中学生です。
sentence.romaji: uchi no jijo ha haru kara chuugakusei desu
sentence.english: Our second daughter is going into junior high this spring.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uta

sentence.kanji: 私はその歌を知らなかった。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sono uta wo shiranakata 。
sentence.english: I didn't know that song.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's unten

sentence.kanji: 父は安全運転だ。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha anzen unten da
sentence.english: My father drives safely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maishuu

sentence.kanji: 私は毎週母に電話をします。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha maishuu haha ni denwa wo shimasu
sentence.english: I call my mother every week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's neesan

sentence.kanji: 姉さん、ごめんね。
sentence.romaji: neesan gomen ne
sentence.english: I'm sorry sis.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaigai

sentence.kanji: 彼は海外での生活が長いです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaigai de no seikatsu ga nagai desu
sentence.english: He's lived abroad for a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tateru

sentence.kanji: 彼はケーキにろうそくを立てた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ke-ki ni rousoku wo tateta
sentence.english: He stuck the candles into the cake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tooku

sentence.kanji: 遠くに船が見えます。
sentence.romaji: tooku ni fune ga miemasu
sentence.english: I can see a ship in the distance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuraberu

sentence.kanji: 今月と先月の売上を比べた。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu to sengetsu no uriage wo kurabeta
sentence.english: I compared this month's sales with last month's.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kowasu

sentence.kanji: 彼女が私のケータイを壊した。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ga watashi no ke-tai wo kowashita
sentence.english: She destroyed my cell phone.

cards.english: break, break down, get out of order
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kowareru

sentence.kanji: 会社のパソコンが壊れた。
sentence.romaji: kaisha no pasokon ga kowareta
sentence.english: The company computer broke down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumo

sentence.kanji: 今日は雲が多い。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha kumo ga ooi
sentence.english: It's cloudy today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumori

sentence.kanji: 今日は一日曇りでした。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha ichinichi kumori deshita
sentence.english: It was cloudy all day today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hashi

sentence.kanji: あの橋は日本で一番長い。
sentence.romaji: ano hashi ha nihon de ichiban nagai
sentence.english: That bridge is the longest in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oohaba

sentence.kanji: 計画を大幅に変更した。
sentence.romaji: keikaku wo oohaba ni henkou shita
sentence.english: We substantially changed the plan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ura

sentence.kanji: 会社の裏に公園があります。
sentence.romaji: kaisha no ura ni kouen ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a park behind the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minasan

sentence.kanji: 皆さんにお話があります。
sentence.romaji: minasan ni ohanashi ga arimasu
sentence.english: I have something to say to everybody.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naku

sentence.kanji: 妹はすぐに泣く。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha sugu ni naku
sentence.english: My little sister cries easily.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikin

sentence.kanji: 私たちは今、結婚資金を貯めています。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha ima kekon shikin wo tamete imasu
sentence.english: We're saving for the wedding now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maitsuki

sentence.kanji: 私は毎月貯金をしています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha maitsuki chokin wo shite imasu
sentence.english: I save money every month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawakasu

sentence.kanji: ぬれた服を乾かした。
sentence.romaji: nureta fuku wo kawakashita
sentence.english: I dried the wet clothes.

cards.english: blow, play on a wind instrument
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuku

sentence.kanji: 今日は北風が吹いている。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha kitakaze ga fuite iru
sentence.english: The north wind is blowing today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mainichi

sentence.kanji: 私たちは毎日散歩をします。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha mainichi sanpo wo shimasu
sentence.english: We go for a walk every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haikei

sentence.kanji: 事件の背景に何があったのだろう。
sentence.romaji: jiken no haikei ni nani ga ata no darou
sentence.english: I wonder what was behind the incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sugata

sentence.kanji: 遠くに彼女の姿が見えた。
sentence.romaji: tooku ni kanojo no sugata ga mieta
sentence.english: I saw her figure from a long way away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawaku

sentence.kanji: 夏は洗濯物がすぐ乾く。
sentence.romaji: natsu ha sentakumono ga sugu kawaku
sentence.english: Laundry dries quickly in summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taku

sentence.kanji: 母は毎朝ご飯を炊く。
sentence.romaji: haha ha maiasa gohan wo taku
sentence.english: My mother cooks rice every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jisui

sentence.kanji: 私は毎日、自炊している。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mainichi jisui shite iru
sentence.english: I cook for myself every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nioi

sentence.kanji: いい匂いがする。
sentence.romaji: ii nioi ga suru
sentence.english: It smells good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sasu

sentence.kanji: 虫に腕を刺されました。
sentence.romaji: mushi ni ude wo sasaremashita
sentence.english: I was stung on the arm by an insect.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawaisou

sentence.kanji: その可哀相な子供たちは食べるものがない。
sentence.romaji: sono kawaisou na kodomotachi ha taberu mono ga nai
sentence.english: Those poor children have nothing to eat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koro

sentence.kanji: 子供の頃、よくその公園で遊んだ。
sentence.romaji: kodomo no koro yoku sono kouen de asonda
sentence.english: I often played in that park when I was a kid.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konogoro

sentence.kanji: この頃、よく肩が凝る。
sentence.romaji: konogoro yoku kata ga koru
sentence.english: These days I often get stiff shoulders.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's medatsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女の大きな帽子はとても目立つ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no ooki na boushi ha totemo medatsu
sentence.english: Her big hat really stands out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's boushi

sentence.kanji: 暑いので帽子を被りましょう。
sentence.romaji: atsui no de boushi wo kaburimashou
sentence.english: You should wear a hat because it's hot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaminari

sentence.kanji: 雷が鳴っています。
sentence.romaji: kaminari ga nate imasu
sentence.english: Thunder is rumbling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's korobu

sentence.kanji: お祖母ちゃんがお風呂場で転んだ。
sentence.romaji: obaachan ga ofuroba de koronda
sentence.english: My grandma fell down in the bathroom.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyu

sentence.kanji: 梅雨は6月頃です。
sentence.romaji: tsuyu ha rokugatsugoro desu
sentence.english: The rainy season comes around June.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikaru

sentence.kanji: 父親が子供を叱っている。
sentence.romaji: chichioya ga kodomo wo shikate iru
sentence.english: That father is scolding his children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amanogawa

sentence.kanji: 今夜は天の川が見えますね。
sentence.romaji: konya ha amanogawa ga miemasu ne
sentence.english: The Milky Way can be seen tonight.
